mapper.sql: ADMINISTRATIVE_REGION_ID as administrativeRegionId, ADMINISTRATIVE_REGION_CODE as administrativeRegionCode, ADMINISTRATIVE_REGION_NAME as administrativeRegionName, ADMINISTRATIVE_REGION_BRIEF_CODE as administrativeRegionBriefCode, ADMINISTRATIVE_GRADE as administrativeGrade, PARENT_ADMINISTRATIVE_REGION_ID as parentAdministrativeRegionId, SORT_NUM as sortNum, STATUS as status, CREATER_ID as createrId, CREATER_NAME as createrName, CREATE_TIME as createTime, MODIFIER_ID as modifierId, MODIFIER_NAME as modifierName, MODIFY_TIME as modifyTime
mapper.insert: insert into drt_administrative_region (ADMINISTRATIVE_REGION_ID, ADMINISTRATIVE_REGION_CODE, ADMINISTRATIVE_REGION_NAME, ADMINISTRATIVE_REGION_BRIEF_CODE, ADMINISTRATIVE_GRADE, PARENT_ADMINISTRATIVE_REGION_ID, SORT_NUM, STATUS, CREATER_ID, CREATER_NAME, CREATE_TIME, MODIFIER_ID, MODIFIER_NAME, MODIFY_TIME) values (#{administrativeRegionId}, #{administrativeRegionCode}, #{administrativeRegionName}, #{administrativeRegionBriefCode}, #{administrativeGrade}, #{parentAdministrativeRegionId}, #{sortNum}, #{status}, #{createrId}, #{createrName}, #{createTime}, #{modifierId}, #{modifierName}, #{modifyTime})
